co.cask.cdap.api.service
Interface Service

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractService
public interface Service

Defines a custom user Service. Services are custom applications that run in program containers and provide endpoints to serve requests. ServiceWorkers may also be added to perform additional operations and tasks on behalf of the Service.

Method Summary
 void configure(ServiceConfigurer configurer)
          Configure the Service by adding HttpServiceHandlers to handle requests and ServiceWorkers.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(ServiceConfigurer configurer)
Configure the Service by adding HttpServiceHandlers to handle requests and ServiceWorkers.

Parameters:
configurer - to use to add handlers and workers to the Service.
